items.title: I quit my tech job and became a stay-at-home dad. I sometimes feel lost because I'm not making money, but I still feel valuable.

items.title_zh: 我辞去了科技行业的工作，成为了一名全职爸爸。有时会因为没有收入而感到迷茫，但我依然觉得自己很有价值。
